item.name: modulename
item.description: Parameter for the name of the module

item.name: modulerealeasedate
item.description: Parameter for the module release date

item.name: moduleversion
item.description: Parameter for the module version, starts at 0.01 on creation

item.name: sidemenucategory
item.description: Parameter for the side menu category (optional)

item.name: context_aware
item.description: Parameter for indicating whether the module is context-aware

item.name: depends_context
item.description: Parameter for indicating if the module depends on context
